document.full_text: more than 10,000 antigovernment protesters rallied in the capital, yerevan, on thursday, demanding new elections and the release of their incarcerated colleagues.
document.title: europe: armenia: 10,000 protesters demand new elections
lines_and_colors: more than 10,000 antigovernment protesters rallied in the capital, yerevan, on thursday, demanding new elections and the release of their incarcerated colleagues.
